name: iNELSHomeControl
0:
”Alexa, set RGB to red”
”Alexa, turn on ventilation”
”Alexa, turn on dimmed light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To control your smart home you need to own elements from the iNELS RF Control series. These elements must be configured using the iNELS RF application and the master eLAN control device must be connected to the iNELS Cloud service. Follow next steps to easily connect RF elements to Amazon Alexa voice service. This gives you a flexible and fast way to control your home.

SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

1. Configure iNELS RF system

2. Create iNELS Cloud account by using iNELS RF Home Control - Cloud application

3. Sign your eLAN to iNELS Cloud

4. Enable iNELS Smart Home skill in your Amazon Alexa application and link it to your iNELS Cloud account

5. Search your devices by using voice command: Alexa, discover devices

6. Now you can control your home by voice commands

VOICE COMMANDS

Lights
- Alexa, set RGB to red
- Alexa, turn on dimmed light
Switches
- Alexa, turn on ventilation

COMPATIBLE ELEMENTS

RFSA-11B, RFUS-11, RFSC-11
RFSA-61M, RFUS-61, RFSC-61, RFSAI-61B, RFSA-61B, RFSA-62B, RFSA-66M

RFJA-12B

RFDA-11B, RFDSC-11
RFDA-71B, RFDSC-71, RFDAC-71B, RFDEL-71B
RF-WHITE-LED-675

RFSTI-11B, RFSTI-11G, RFTI-10B, RFTC-10G

RFATV-1

RFSF-1B, RFWD-100, RFMD-10

You can find more information about voice control and setup on www.elkoep.com
